statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Given you n sets.All positive integers in sets are not less than 1 and not greater than m.If use these sets to combinate the new set,how many different new set you can get.The given sets can not be broken.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There are several cases.For each case,the first line contains two positive integer n and m(1<=n<=100,1<=m<=14).Then the following n lines describe the n sets.These lines each contains k+1 positive integer,the first which is k,then k integers are given. The input is end by EOF.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case,the output contain only one integer,the number of the different sets you get.

statement.title: Source
statement.content: 2009 Multi-University Training Contest 11 - Host by HRBEU
